org.apache.polygene.spi

Interface PolygeneSPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PolygeneAPI

    public interface PolygeneSPI
extends PolygeneAPI
    Encapsulation of the Polygene SPI. This is implemented by the runtime.

      • entityReferenceOf

        EntityReference entityReferenceOf(Association<?> assoc)
        Fetches the EntityReference without loading the referenced entity.
        Parameters:
        assoc - The Association for which we want to obtain the EntityReference
        Returns:
        The EntityReference of the given Association.

      • entityReferencesOf

        Stream<EntityReference> entityReferencesOf(ManyAssociation<?> assoc)
        Fetches the EntityReferences without loading the referenced entities.
        Parameters:
        assoc - The ManyAssociation for which we want to obtain the EntityReferences.
        Returns:
        A stream of all the EntityReferences of the given ManyAssociation.

      • entityReferencesOf

        Stream<Map.Entry<String,EntityReference>> entityReferencesOf(NamedAssociation<?> assoc)
        Fetches the EntityReferences without loading the referenced entities.
        Parameters:
        assoc - The NamedAssociation for which we want to obtain the EntityReference
        Returns:
        A stream of Map.Entry with the names and EntityReferences of the given NamedAssociation.
